    • getSessionByToken

      public static Session getSessionByToken(String token)
      Returns the session for the given token. If no session is active, it will create a new one. Therefore, it is guaranteed, that this method always returns an active session.
      Parameters:
      token - String, the token to search the session
      Returns:
      an active Session with a running PlanGenerator
